explanation: [0-0] The video starts with a black background. A jar of peanut butter is held in the left hand and a white lid is held in the right hand. On the upper part of the screen, there is a blue hat and a palm icon with the English word "or" in between. In the lower left corner, a man wearing a white shirt and a cute cat are watching the video. On the left side of the screen, there is a white rectangle with a white watermark "@Waiehmyhaircut".

[0-2] After the white lid is twisted open, the right hand turns the lid around to show it to the camera. The white rectangle with the white watermark "@Waiehmyhaircut" moves to the lower right corner.

[2-10] Subsequently, the shot switches to the left hand holding the lid and the right hand using a key to pry open the white paper inside the lid. Then, the foil inside is revealed, which is then pried open with the key to reveal a white plastic tool that is taken out by hand. The man and his cat continue to watch attentively, their expressions unchanged.
